title: To the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, the Right Worshipfull the Aldermen and Commons of the City of London in the Common or Guildhall of the City of London assembled. The humble petition of the citizens, commanders, officers, and souldiers of the trained bands and auxiliaries, the young men and apprentices of the cities of London and Westminster, sea commanders sea men and watermen together with divers other commanders, officers and souldiers within the line of communication and parishes mentioned in the weekely bills of mortality.
